attributes.action: If an electorial party gets over 15% of the votes the party gets a rebate based on the number of votes the party got
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If a party gets 15% of the voters selection they get a rebate on the amount of votes they got. This will aid the smaller parties to getting a better chance to compete with the 3 main parties;New Labour, The Conservatives and The Liberal Democrats.
